attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel it is an intrusion into our privacy to have satalite tracking in all the vehicles.  It will also be an additional tax on citizens who use their cars to travel too and from work

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to acion not your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
